data.title: Machine Girl — Red 5 Comics
data.text:
Machine Girl #1

By Matts, Art by Sergio Monjes

In a galaxy far far away… There is a planet full of exotic interplanetary people. All of them living together in a dangerous multicultural world. And right there in the middle there is Megan! A young human girl fighting her way up on the deadly arena of the Intergalactic Mixed Battling Arts as she searches for her origins and other beings like her while she is obsessed with a mysterious, long forgotten planet: Earth.

Machine Girl #3

Machine Girl has been hacked! Inside her mind, her mysterious captors try to teach her a history lesson. Is her father the man she thought she was... or is he something more sinister?

Machine Girl Vol. 1

In a galaxy far, far away... There is a planet full of exotic interplanetary people. All of them living together in a dangerous multicultural world. And right there in the middle there is Megan! A young human girl fighting her way up on the deadly arena of the Intergalactic Mixed Battling Arts as she searches for her origins and other beings like her while she is obsessed with a mysterious, long forgotten planet: Earth.

Collecting Machine Girl vol. 1 #1-4.

Machine Girl & the Space Invaders #2

Megan and her gang travel to a distant moon following a mysterious distress call from a stranded human colony. But the seemingly peaceful town may be more dangerous than it seems. Is she ready to fight a squadron of alien mercenaries under the command of a ruthless scientist?

Machine Girl & the Space Invaders #4

Final issue! The horrific experiments being held by the Space Invaders on the Human Colony comes to light after Megan is captured by the sadistic evil forces of Dr. Oztrop. Her only hope to defeat them is to count on all of her friends. Old and new ones!
